Topic.Title: Overwritten saves problem, one slot only...

Posts.EditableText:
I placed multiple saves, creating bonfire rooms.

Problem: the save is overwritten every time ....
Is it possible to save in different slots, every time you save? 

I Use :   MoveObjectHere (save)      in room script.

Thanks in advance <3

P.S. can you run a clearscreen after a save load?  (to clear all text after loading)

I placed multiple saves, creating bonfire rooms.
